backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing access control, blob storage mixins, user profiles, OTP handling, and registration submission including the new optional applicantPhoto field.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old registrations to the new format by adding an applicantPhoto field and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence annotations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including registration steps, admin panel components, hooks, and global styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark mode styles, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, setting metadata, and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling splash screen, switching between registration and admin views, and resetting registration flow state on return.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced-motion support, auto-dismiss timer, and skip button using Tailwind styling.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin interface handling auth, admin checks, registration fetching, selection, editing, and deletion logic.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card providing admin access recovery via setup code or username/password, with status diagnostics and error handling.
Error boundary that catches and displays errors when rendering specific registration details and offers retry options.
Error boundary wrapping the entire admin panel, showing error info and allowing retry or page refresh.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Component that loads and displays document images from direct URLs with loading, error, and retry states.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration fields with change tracking, validation, and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: React component showing registration details with loading, empty, and error states, plus admin actions like editing, downloading, printing, and deleting.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: Provides a mutation for admin password login with normalized error handling and query invalidation.
React Query hooks for checking admin status, fetching registrations, deleting registrations optimistically, and updating registration data.
Mutation hook applying an admin setup code, storing it, reinitializing the actor, and refreshing admin queries.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/adminD: Utility to download individual or all registration documents by generating blobs and triggering downloads.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/adminP: Generates printable HTML for a registration including personal info, service details, and document checklist.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/regist: Helpers for formatting registration data, building display names, generating data warnings, formatting timestamps, and safe document access.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary that catches step-level errors and shows a refresh prompt with technical details. Reloads the page on user request.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Hook detecting double-click or double-tap interactions and showing a temporary hint. Invokes a callback when a double interaction is confirmed.
Defines React Query mutations for OTP generation, OTP verification, and registration submission. Converts uploaded files to ExternalBlob before sending.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Manages multi-step registration flow with validation, navigation, and double-interaction admin access. Tracks customer details, documents, terms acceptance, and triggers the correct step component.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Customer details form with validation and controlled inputs. Reports validity and data changes to the parent step handler.
Handles OTP generation, entry, verification, and final registration submission. Shows success UI after registration completes.
Displays terms, captures user agreement with timestamp, and supports printing sanitized proof. Reports acceptance state and timestamp to parent.
React component handling Aadhaar, PAN, and optional receipt/photo uploads with previews and validation callbacks.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports structured router and service terms for registration.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document uploads, and step props.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details fields including phone, email, address, and age.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and helpers for login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark themes and custom styles for admin and splash screens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color system, extended utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Describes project state, feature requirements, pending requests, and known issues related to customer verification features and admin tooling.
